outcomes.content: Spent half day troubleshooting Slack bot DM issue - tried reinstalling app 3+ times, verified all scopes (added im:write), updated App Manifest, updated Cloudflare tokens multiple times. Issue persists: 'Sending messages to this app has been turned off'. Next step: create new Slack app from scratch.
PSOF switched from trading once per day to twice per day
Migrated Jeff from Claude Code API to Enterprise Premium and discussed use cases in his software development
Slack bot started working (issue resolved overnight). Enhanced bot to accept unstructured messages - can now send any text and it captures as 'raw' type for review during check-in

Built mobile dashboard for personal assistant using GitHub Actions + Cloudflare Pages. Key decisions: (1) GitHub Actions instead of local Python since no local Python install, (2) Intelligent task sorting by content analysis (health/medical highest priority, then financial/communication, then research/setup, then purchases), (3) Cloudflare Pages over GitHub Pages for better global CDN performance. Dashboard auto-updates within 60 seconds of any git push. URL: https://personal-assistant-dashboard.pages.dev/
